title: Ticket #2883: DMTCP_GZIP option ignored
description:
Michael Hanke writes:

  we started using DMTCP and its Condor integration more and more on our cluster -- especially for Python scripts. I noticed that setting DMTCP_GZIP has no effect and snapshots are always written uncompressed. At least I can shrink their size dramatically by (re-)compressing them with gzip manually.

  I wonder if this is a bug in DMTCP or in the shim script. I basically pass DMTCP_GZIP=1 into the submit file's environment setting.

We should investigate this. I suspect that the problem is upstream, in which case we'll need to pass on the report.
remarks:
2012-Mar-12 11:58:24 by adesmet:
Michael Hanke writes:
  It seems that this was a problem of an outdated dmtcp. I upgraded to 1.2.4 and compression works. Cool.
